alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 4:40PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Elmore and southeastern Owyhee Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tindall Ranch, or 26 miles north of Owyhee, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Blackstone Reservoir, Gedney Butte and Bruneau River Launch Site around 450 PM MDT. Twin Butte and Monument Butte around 500 PM MDT. Winter Camp Butte, Lookout Butte, Bruneau Canyon Viewpoint and Clover Creek Crossing around 510 PM MDT. Crows Nest Butte and Pot Hole Butte around 520 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
